scripts.install: cd client && npm i && cd ../server && npm i && cd ..
scripts.eslint: cd client && npm run eslint && cd ../server && npm run eslint && cd ..
scripts.build: cd client && npm run build && cd ../server && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.start: npm run install && npm run eslint && npm run build && cd server && npm run start
scripts.startClient: npm run eslint && cd client && npm run start
scripts.updateConfigs: cd client && npm i @oathompsonjones/eslint-config@latest && npm i @oathompsonjones/ts-config@latest && cd ../server && npm i @oathompsonjones/eslint-config@latest && npm i @oathompsonjones/ts-config@latest && cd ..
